attributes.action: explain why tony blairs expenses have gone missing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why has tony blair expenses accounts gone missing, I have to keep my accounts seven years, and penalised if I do not.I would like to know about TBs house purchases and his house flipping activities,especially his remortgages, and million pound london purchases

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
